Seal characters (1)

澥字的基本解释

澥
xiè
糊状物或胶状物由稠变稀：糨糊澥了。
〔渤澥〕古代称东海的一部分，即“渤海”。
加水使糊状物或胶状物变稀：粥太稠，加水澥一澥。

澥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》胡買切，上蟹，匣。］
(1)伸入陆地的海湾。古代亦特指勃澥，即今渤海。
(2)海。泛指江河湖海。
(3)湖汊。湖北省武昌县有豹子澥，是梁子湖的一个分汊，因形如豹子，故名。
(4)指糊状物、胶状物等由稠变稀。
(5)指加水使糊状物、胶状物等变稀。
(6)即嶰谷。昆仑山北谷名。

澥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澥； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页652第47
【唐韻】【正韻】胡買切【集韻】【韻會】下買切，?音蟹。【說文】渤澥，海之別名也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】浮渤澥【註】斷水曰澥。　又漻澥，小水別名。【張衡·西京賦】擿漻澥。　又【類篇】一曰澥，谷也。

澥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
澥字的起名意思

指海或靠近陆地的海湾。

creek
Basic explanation of words
creek
xiè
The paste or jelly has changed from thick to thin: the paste has become thin.
[Boxi] In ancient times, it was called a part of the East China Sea, that is, "Bohai".
Add water to make the paste or jelly thin: the porridge is too thick, add water for a while.
creek
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guang Yun" Hu Mai cut, crab, box. ]
(1) A bay that stretches into the land. In ancient times, it also specifically referred to Bo Xie, which is now the Bohai Sea.
(2) The sea. Refers to rivers, lakes and seas.
(3) Lake branch. There is a leopard in Wuchang County, Hubei Province, which is a branch of Liangzi Lake. It is named because of its shape like a leopard.
(4) Refers to pastes, jelly, etc. from thick to thin.
(5) It means adding water to make the paste, jelly, etc. thin.
(6) That is Shigu. The name of the north valley of Kunlun Mountain.
creek
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　澥; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 652 47
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Maiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Buy and cut it underneath,? Yin Crab. [Said the text] Bo Xi, the alias of the sea. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Fu Boxie 【Note】Xie is said to be cut off from the water.　 You Luo Xing, another name for Xiao Shui. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Shuizhuying.　[Classes] Again, I said Ye, Gu Ye.
creek
